Non-operating appropriations in aid for 2001-02
	The Schedule to this Act sets out modifications of the limits set for thepurposes of section 2 of the Government Resources and Accounts Act [2000 (c.20)](/id/ukpga/2000/20?view=plain "Go to item of legislation") on theresources applicable, in accordance with that Act, as non-operatingappropriations in aid for the year 2001-02.
	The limits, as modified by the Schedule to this Act, shall be deemed tohave been in force throughout the year 2001-02.
	Subsection (2), so far as it relates to the reduction of a limit, does notaffect the validity of any direction given by the Treasury under section 2 ofthe Government Resources and Accounts Act 2000 during the year 2001-02.
	In this section “the year 2001-02” means the year that ended with 31stMarch 2002.
Short title
	This Act may be cited as the Appropriation (No. 2) Act 2002.
